Articles.Content:
Hey guys, don\'t exactly know where to put this but this seems like a decent place. I\'m looking for a decoupler that is kind of L-shaped and keeps your rocket from making contact with the launchpad. I\'ve seen a few images of them, they are large and red. I have no idea what to call them or I\'d just use the search bar. Any help would be appreciated!

- Thanks

Based on the description you gave, i think this is the one you\'re looking for:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4435.msg61154#msg61154
Thank you, yes, that sounds like what I\'m looking for.
